title: Where Jesus Walked - 33 Must-See Holy Sites (gnv64)
description:
Where Jesus Walked - 33 Must-See Holy Sites
English | True PDF | 116 pages | 38.4 mb

6 The Geography of Jesus - A quick-start orientation guide to JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ journeys.
8 Jesus & His People: The Other 97% Rich Roman occupiers lived large in first-century Palestine.
18 First steps in Nazareth - The tiny hamlet that shaped JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ early years.
24 The City on the Hill - A short walk from Nazareth, Sepphoris exposed the twenty-something Jesus to affluent Greco-Roman culture.
28 Journey to the Jordan River - The baptism of Jesus.
34 Walking the Wilderness - Jesus in the Judean Desert.
40 Ã¢â‚¬ËœA New Kind of FishermanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ - Why did the disciples follow Jesus into such rough waters? What an amazing archeological discovery reveals about their lives in the fishing village of Capernaum.
44 Walking Around & On the Sea of Galilee - Explore the water that was JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ pulpit and background for miracles.
48 Healing Miracles on the Galilean Shores - JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ work healing the sick is one of his most well known legacies.
52 Ã¢â‚¬ËœConsider the Lilies of the FieldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ - Bask in the blooms that inspired one of JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ most important lessons.
54 Birdwatching with Jesus - With about one billion birds migrating the region every year, Galileans had plenty of sky-high reminders to trust in GodÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s love. A look at what Jesus saw when he gazed upward.
58 Pearls of Wisdom - Jewelry spotted only among the very rich inspires a parable.
60 Stopping In Samaria - Most Galilean Jews hurried through or avoided the region completely on their way to Jerusalem, but Jesus paused to have a drink and spread the good news.
66 New Face in an Ancient City - Jericho, the oldest continuously occupied city in the world, has seen a
lot of excitementÃ¢â‚¬â€especially when Jesus came into town.
72 Miracle on the Mountain - You never know what will happen on a walk with Jesus. What three disciples witnessed during a hike that took them to new spiritual heights.
74 Home Away from Home - The house of Mary and Martha at Bethany.
80 Talk of 10 Towns - Jesus casts out demons in the Decapolis, spreading good news to the Gentiles.
84 The Ride Into Jerusalem - One remarkable day in the life of a 5,500-year-old city.
86 Turning the Tables - Jesus wrecked havoc at the Jerusalem temple during his last week of life. Why he had such mixed feelings about IsraelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most sacred spot and what it feels like to walk its perimeter today.
92 The Garden of Gethsemane - Prayer, Agony & Capture.
96 Walking with the Cross Ã¢â‚¬ËœThe Way of Grief.Ã¢â‚¬â„¢
102 His Last Steps on Earth - The Resurrection and Ascension of Jesus.
110 Walk Where Jesus Walked - Top places to visit in the Holy Land.
112 Jesus in Art - Since Jesus walked on earth, his face is one that has been imagined by artists around the world through the centuries.
